channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Burna Boy Reveals Release Date for New Album, Shares New Song Featuring Travis Scott: Listen
item.description: 🎉 New music alert! Burna Boy drops release date for upcoming album and surprise collab with Travis Scott! 🔥🎶 #BurnaBoy #TravisScott #NewMusic

item.title: Dead & Company to Celebrate Grateful Dead’s 60th Anniversary With San Francisco Concerts
item.description: 🎉 Get ready to jam with Dead & Company as they celebrate Grateful Dead's 60th anniversary in San Francisco! 🌟🎸 #GratefulDead60th #DeadAndCompany

item.title: Night Tapes Announce Debut Album portals // polarities: Hear “pacifico”
item.description: 🎶 Dive into dreamy vibes with Night Tapes' debut album portals // polarities! 🌌 Listen to the enchanting track "pacifico" now! 🌟 #NightTapes #NewMusic

item.title: The Kooks Go Back to the Beginning
item.description: 🎶 Dive into nostalgia w/ @thekooksmusic as they revisit their roots! 🕰️ #TheKooks #MusicNews
